gretting:
Eighteen years ago, my story began. Every moment since then has been shaped by love, laughter, and the guidance of the people who have stood beside me through it all. I am endlessly grateful to my family and friends who have filled my life with warmth, joy, and strength. 

 As I step into this new chapter of my life, I carry all your love and memories with me. It would mean the world to me if you could join me in celebrating this special milestone, as we look back with gratitude and forward with hope.
